lead_paragraph: This fictional film by Tim Sutton was inspired by the massacre in 2012 at a showing of the film “The Dark Night Rises” in an Aurora, Colo., theater.
snippet: This fictional film by Tim Sutton was inspired by the massacre in 2012 at a showing of the film “The Dark Night Rises” in an Aurora, Colo., theater....

headline.main: Review: In ‘Dark Night,’ Another Movie Theater, Another Shooting
